mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_name, email, password, blog_name, delete_flag, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{userName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{blogName}, 0, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, email AS email, password AS password, blog_name AS blogName, delete_flag AS deleteFlag, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM users WHERE email = #{email};

SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, user_img AS userImg, email AS email, password AS password, blog_name AS blogName, blog_img AS blogImg, delete_flag AS deleteFlag, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_name=#{userName}, user_img=#{userImg}, email=#{email}, blog_name=#{blogName}, blog_img=#{blogImg}, update_date=now() WHERE user_id=#{userId}
